If you don't see them in your account or have any issues accessing them, please contact the Boise State Ticket Office at ticketoffice@boisestate.edu or 208-426-4737.

For graduates who RSVP’d for commencement, guest tickets are loaded into your Boise State Athletics Ticketmaster account (you will need to create an account using your BroncoMail email address if you do not already have a Boise State Ticketmaster account).

In the case of a thunderstorm, the ceremony will be delayed ~30 minutes until no lightning is within at least eight miles.
Graduates must immediately return to Bronco Gym where they checked in or to their vehicles. Guests can use the stadium concourse, @ExtraMileArena or the SUB.

Rain showers (60%) are expected on Saturday mid-day before the ceremony ends. Umbrellas are not allowed inside the stadium. Free ponchos will be on-hand for graduates. For guests, please bring a poncho or purchase one from concession stands located inside Albertsons Stadium.
